original: mos pas spyod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i sar gtogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: mos pas spyod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i sar gtogs pa rnams so //
translated: The first is the stage of devoted conduct, the second is the stage of pure superior intention, the third is the stage of maturation, and the fourth is the stage of relinquishing all obscurations.

original: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / de'i ye shes thob pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa ni bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i mtshan nyid can rnams kyis shes rab kyi dbang bskur bar ci rigs par 'khyud pa dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / de'i ye shes thob pa'i rgyu mtshan rnams dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa ni bsnyen pa dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i mtshan nyid can rnams kyis shes rab kyi dbang bskur bar ci rigs par 'khyud pa dang /
translated: The extremely pure expanse of reality and the signs of attaining its pristine awareness are known through the glorious Guhyasamaja and other tantras by means of the characteristics of the stages of approach and close approach, accomplishment and great accomplishment.🔽The mudra of the consort, the mudra of the seal of the wisdom of the arising of pristine awareness, and the mudra of the seal of all tathagatas are the three mudras.

original: rab tu 'byed pa dang / ye shes 'char ba'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgyas btab pa'i bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dper gyur pa dang / dpes bstan par bya ba mtshon nas /
analyzed: rab tu 'byed pa dang / ye shes 'char ba'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rgyas btab pa'i bde ba chen por ro gcig pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dper gyur pa dang / dpes bstan par bya ba mtshon nas /
translated: The great vajra holder, who is the example of the great vajra holder who is of one taste with the great bliss of the seal of all tathagatas, is indicated by the example and the teaching by example.

original: thob par bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa rnams de'i rgyu nyid du sgrub pa bzhi po rnams yang dag par mtshon par byed pa yin par rig @163b par bya'o //
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa rnams de'i rgyu nyid du sgrub pa bzhi po rnams yang dag par mtshon par byed pa yin par rig @163b par bya'o //
translated: The four proofs establish that the causes of the object to be attained are its causes.

original: de'i rjes la nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pas las thams cad rnam par dag pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i rjes la nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pas las thams cad rnam par dag pa yin la /
translated: After that, all actions are purified by the purification of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience.

original: las rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu thob pa yin no //
analyzed: las rnam par dag pas rnam par dag pa'i 'bras bu thob pa yin no //
translated: And by the purification of actions, the effect of purification is attained.🔽And that is stated:

original: de yang / nyon mongs rdo rje dag gyur pas //🔽las rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yang / nyon mongs rdo rje dag gyur pas // las rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur //
translated: By the purification of the vajra of the afflictions,🔽actions are purified.

original: las rnams rnam par dag gyur pas //
analyzed: las rnams rnam par dag gyur pas //
translated: By the purification of actions,

original: las skyes 'bras bu'ang rnam par dag / ces gsungs pas so //
analyzed: las skyes 'bras bu'ang rnam par dag / ces gsungs pas so //
translated: the effect born from actions is also purified.

original: de lta bas na chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid can gyi bsgrub bya sgrib pa dang bral ba zag pa med pa /
analyzed: de lta bas na chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid can gyi bsgrub bya sgrib pa dang bral ba zag pa med pa /
translated: Therefore, the object to be attained, which has the characteristic of the Dharma body, is free from obscurations, is undefiled,

original: mi nyams pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / de'i ye shes kyi ngo bo me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can dang /
analyzed: mi nyams pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / de'i ye shes kyi ngo bo me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can dang /
translated: The nature of unchanging great bliss is the completely pure dharmadhatu of nonduality and the essence of its wisdom is the mirrorlike, the equality, the individually discriminating, and the all-accomplishing wisdoms.🔽

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rten dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can sprul pa'i sku rab tu bskyed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rten dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can sprul pa'i sku rab tu bskyed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The practice of all buddhas is the generation of the support of the enjoyment body and the nature of the gnosis of successful activities, the emanation body.

original: de'i sgrub pa'i thabs ni gsang sngags kyi tshul 'dir dpe phyag rgya las mtshon par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgrub pa'i thabs ni gsang sngags kyi tshul 'dir dpe phyag rgya las mtshon par bya ba yin no //
translated: The method of accomplishing that is to be illustrated by the example of the seal in this way of mantra.

original: de lta bas na sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes thogs su yan lag mchog dang sbyar ba las rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor chud pa'i byang chub kyi sems man ngag gis padma'i snying por rdo rje nor bus mnan pa'am /
analyzed: de lta bas na sgrub pa'i thabs kyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes thogs su yan lag mchog dang sbyar ba las rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor chud pa'i byang chub kyi sems man ngag gis padma'i snying por rdo rje nor bus mnan pa'am /
translated: Therefore, immediately after the definition of the method of practice, the supreme branch is applied, and the bodhicitta that enters the tip of the vajra jewel is pressed down by the vajra jewel in the center of the lotus through the esoteric instructions.

original: rlung las rgyal bar bya ba goms pa'am /
analyzed: rlung las rgyal bar bya ba goms pa'am /
translated: One should be familiar with the conquest of the wind.

original: phat la sogs pa'i sngags kyis nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bzung nas /
analyzed: phat la sogs pa'i sngags kyis nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bzung nas /
translated: Or, having taken up the power of the mantra of phat and so forth,

original: de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyun mi 'chang pa brjod pa med pa /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyun mi 'chang pa brjod pa med pa /
translated: one should not interrupt the stream of connate joy, which is inexpressible.

original: dbang po'i 'jug pa thams cad chub pa /
analyzed: dbang po'i 'jug pa thams cad chub pa /
translated: One should be fully engaged in all the sense objects.

original: bde ba chen po tsam rab tu snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / de'i ye shes kyi ngo bo chos kyi sku mtshon par byed pa /
analyzed: bde ba chen po tsam rab tu snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / de'i ye shes kyi ngo bo chos kyi sku mtshon par byed pa /
translated: The pure expanse of reality, which is the mere appearance of great bliss, and the wisdom that is the essence of that is the dharma body.

original: gnyis su med pa rtog pa med pa bde ba tsam rab tu snang ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gcig gis bsgrub par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dpe lta bur de ltar brdar btags nas /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa rtog pa med pa bde ba tsam rab tu snang ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gcig gis bsgrub par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dpe lta bur de ltar brdar btags nas /
translated: One should imagine that the two are nondual, nonconceptual, and the mere appearance of bliss, like the example of Great Vajradhara, who is to be accomplished by the speech of all tathāgatas.

original: dpe dang dpes bstan par bya ba bye brag med par mos par byas nas /
analyzed: dpe dang dpes bstan par bya ba bye brag med par mos par byas nas /
translated: One should imagine that the example and the exemplified are not different.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du de ni 'di yin no zhes mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis 'dir yang dag par mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du de ni 'di yin no zhes mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis 'dir yang dag par mtshon par bya'o //
translated: One should indicate that such is the nature of that, here, by a mind in meditative equipoise, saying this is it.

original: legs par mtshon zhing bstan par byas nas @164a * //
analyzed: legs par mtshon zhing bstan par byas nas @164a * //
translated: Having indicated and taught it well,

original: mngon par rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du lha'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis dam tshig ji lta bar snying gar zla ba dang yi ge h'um la sogs pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje bsgom pa la gus pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du lha'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis dam tshig ji lta bar snying gar zla ba dang yi ge h'um la sogs pa dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje bsgom pa la gus pa dang /
translated: one should practice the commitments according to the yoga of the deity's form, the yoga of innate joy, and the meditation on the vajra of space, just as one has realized it.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par dus ring por rang gi dam tshig la spyod cing man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par dus ring por rang gi dam tshig la spyod cing man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya ba yin te /
translated: One should practice one's commitments continuously for a long time, meditating just as the instructions have been given.

original: ji ltar shin tu myur zhing shin tu bde ba thob pa de ltar bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis pa smra ba'i bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar shin tu myur zhing shin tu bde ba thob pa de ltar bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyogs gnyis pa smra ba'i bsam pa yin no //
translated: One should meditate in such a way that one attains the state of being very swift and very blissful. This is the intention of the second position.

original: phyogs gsum pa nyid kyi bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gsum pa nyid kyi bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention of the third position is this.

original: sgrub pa dang bcas kyang rung /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang bcas kyang rung /
translated: Whether or not one has accomplished it,

original: sgrub pa dang ma bcas pa yin kyang rung /
analyzed: sgrub pa dang ma bcas pa yin kyang rung /
translated: whether or not one has accomplished it,

original: chos kyi sku tsam la mtshon par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi sku tsam la mtshon par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not indicated in the mere dharmakāya.

original: de tsam zhig ni theg pa chen po'i bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: de tsam zhig ni theg pa chen po'i bsgrub bya ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: That alone is not what is to be accomplished in the Mahāyāna,

original: de tsam zhig la ni gzhan gyi don la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam zhig la ni gzhan gyi don la sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in that alone there is no application for the benefit of others.

original: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: gzhan yang sku gnyis po ye shes bzhis bsdus pa nyid kyang bsgrub bya yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang sku gnyis po ye shes bzhis bsdus pa nyid kyang bsgrub bya yin no //
translated: Moreover, the two buddha bodies subsumed by the four kinds of gnosis are also what is to be accomplished.

original: de ltar yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / de'i khongs su gtogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni gtsor bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de ltar yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa las chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang / de'i khongs su gtogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni gtsor bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: Thus, in the vehicle of the perfections, the pure dharmadhātu and the gnosis of the dharmadhātu included within it, called the dharmakāya, are what is to be accomplished.

original: de la brten pa rnam pa thams cad dang don thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rnam pa thams cad du don rtogs pa'i don thams cad de bzhin du yongs su gcod pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
analyzed: de la brten pa rnam pa thams cad dang don thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rnam pa thams cad du don rtogs pa'i don thams cad de bzhin du yongs su gcod pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
translated: The mirror-like pristine wisdom, which is the nature of the reflection of all aspects and all objects, is based on that. The pristine wisdom of equality, which is the realization of equality with all buddhas, and the individually discerning pristine wisdom, which is the complete discernment of all objects as they are, the realization of all aspects in every way,

original: ye shes gsum po 'di dag gi ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gzhan yin no //
analyzed: ye shes gsum po 'di dag gi ngo bo longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gzhan yin no //
translated: are the nature of the so-called enjoyment body, which is another result.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid can bya ba na na tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba yang 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid can bya ba na na tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba yang 'bras bu yin no //
translated: Similarly, the emanation body, which is the nature of the pristine wisdom of activity, characterized by the performance of the activity of going for the sake of beings in every way, is also a result.

original: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi theg par yang brda ji lta ba dang / rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa de'i ye shes kyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni gtsor @164b bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi theg par yang brda ji lta ba dang / rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa de'i ye shes kyi ngo bo mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni gtsor @164b bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The essence of the utterly pure exalted wisdom of that utterly pure expanse of reality, the essence of Akshobhya, is called the truth body and is the primary object of attainment.

original: de bzhin du sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ngo bo rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du sna tshogs kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ngo bo rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo dang /
translated: Likewise, the nature of Vairochana is the mirror-like exalted wisdom that perceives all aspects of variety, the nature of Ratnasambhava is the realization of equality with all buddhas,

original: nyam su myong ba'i don gyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i bdag nyid can so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: nyam su myong ba'i don gyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i bdag nyid can so sor rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: and the nature of Amitabha is the discerning exalted wisdom that completely discerns all aspects of the meaning of experience.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba 'bras bu gnyis las chos kyi sku la brten pa yin no //🔽de bzhin du sna tshogs la khyab pa'i 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba 'bras bu gnyis las chos kyi sku la brten pa yin no // de bzhin du sna tshogs la khyab pa'i 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid can /
translated: The so-called enjoyment body is the result that is based on the Dharma body.

original: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin te sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yin no //
analyzed: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin te sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba gzhan yin no //
translated: Similarly, the essence of the gnosis of successful activities, which has the characteristic of performing the activity of benefiting migrating beings who are pervaded by the diversity, is Amoghasiddhi’s nature, which is the so-called emanation body, the other result to be accomplished.

original: de ltar 'dir yang sku gsum po'i ngo bo nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir yang sku gsum po'i ngo bo nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
translated: Thus, here also, the nature of the three bodies is to be accomplished.

original: bsgrub bya ji lta ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brdar byas pa'i phyag rgyas brda ji lta ba bzhin du mtshon par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ji lta ba de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brdar byas pa'i phyag rgyas brda ji lta ba bzhin du mtshon par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, just as the object to be accomplished is like that, the tathāgatas’ symbolic mudrā, which is made in that way, should be indicated just as it is.

original: ji ltar mtshon zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshon zhe na /
translated: How is it indicated?

original: de lta bas na shes rab kyi dbang bskur gyi dus su rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor phyin pa'i byang chub sems yul de nyid du man ngag ji lta ba nyid dang / phyogs gnyis pa nas bstan pa'i rigs pas bstan par byas pa'i byang chub kyi sems de dang lhan cig skyes par gyur pa gang yin pa rang dang gzhan gyi snang ba'i bye brag dang bral ba /

translated: Therefore, at the time of the consecration of wisdom, the bodhicitta that has reached the tip of the vajra jewel is the reality that is the pith instruction just as it is, and that which is simultaneously born with the bodhicitta that is taught by the reasoning taught in the second section is free from the distinctions of one’s own and others’ appearances.

original: mchog tu bde ba chen po tsam rab tu snang ba dang / gnyis su med pa bya ba thams cad nub par gyur pa dag gi rnam par rtog pa las shin tu 'das pa'i ngo bo rang rig pa der gtad pa mthar phyin pa /

translated: The supreme appearance of mere supreme bliss and nonduality, in which all activities subside, is the ultimate aim of the nature of one’s vidyā, which is the nature of one’s self-awareness that is beyond conceptuality.

original: nam mkha'i dri ma med pa lta bu'i yid mchog tu gyur pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa de ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dri ma med pa lta bu'i yid mchog tu gyur pa'i bde ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa de ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The experience of the supreme bliss of the supreme mind, which is like stainless space, is the characteristic of the dharmakāya.

translated: Also, when the thought of awakening that is emanated within the lotus of wisdom is enjoyed, and that is completely satisfied, the experience of the vajra jewel is the characteristic of the emanation body.

original: de ltar na sku gsum brda ji lta bzhin du phyag rgya las mngon par mtshon ba brtan par byas la man ngag ji lta ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji lta bar lha'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi rnam pa'i dmigs pa'i phyag rgya dang ;
analyzed: de ltar na sku gsum brda ji lta bzhin du phyag rgya las mngon par mtshon ba brtan par byas la man ngag ji lta ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji lta bar lha'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngags kyi rnam pa'i dmigs pa'i phyag rgya dang ;
translated: Thus, having stabilized the seal of the three bodies just as the symbols, one should meditate on the pledge seal of the form of the deity just as the esoteric instructions and just as the clear realization, and the mantra seal of the form of the mantra.

original: rtsa ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dang / gnyis pa de'i rjes thogs las byung ba'i rnam pas dam tshig dang ldan par bsgoms pas bde bar myur du sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs gsum pa smra bar byed pa'i bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor dang / gnyis pa de'i rjes thogs las byung ba'i rnam pas dam tshig dang ldan par bsgoms pas bde bar myur du sku gsum thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni phyogs gsum pa smra bar byed pa'i bsam pa yin no //
translated: By meditating on the root innate yoga and the yoga that arises in its aftermath, one will quickly attain the three bodies in bliss. This is the third position, the intention of the author.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa nyid du yang shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i skabs su sku gsum po nyid bsgrub bya yin par mtshon par bya ba rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa nyid du yang shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i skabs su sku gsum po nyid bsgrub bya yin par mtshon par bya ba rigs pa yin no //
translated: In the Yoginī Tantras such as the Hevajra Tantra, it is reasonable to indicate that the three bodies are the object of attainment in the section on the wisdom empowerment.

original: kha cig ni gtsor bde ba chen po'i rnam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku tsam mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig ni gtsor bde ba chen po'i rnam pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo chos kyi sku tsam mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that it is to be illustrated as the essence of the innate nature of great bliss, which is the mere Dharmakaya.

original: de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa dang bcas pas bsgrub pa dang bcas par mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //🔽brda ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis btags pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
analyzed: de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa dang bcas pas bsgrub pa dang bcas par mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes gzhan dag zer ro // brda ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis btags pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
translated: Others say that it is to be illustrated as the accomplished one, together with the accomplishment of the various aspects and so forth.

original: sku gnyis po chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes bya ba nyid mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
analyzed: sku gnyis po chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa zhes bya ba nyid mtshon par bya ba yin no zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
translated: Others say that it is to be illustrated as the two bodies called the Dharmakaya and the Sambhogakaya, following the reality of the mudra which is designated by all Tathagatas according to the conventional symbols.

original: de lta bas na gang nam mkha' dri ma med pa ltar /
analyzed: de lta bas na gang nam mkha' dri ma med pa ltar /
translated: Therefore, it is like stainless space.

original: snang ba med pa bde ba chen po tsam rab tu snang ba nyams su myong ba'i mchog de ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i ngo bo chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid yin no ;
analyzed: snang ba med pa bde ba chen po tsam rab tu snang ba nyams su myong ba'i mchog de ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i ngo bo chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid yin no ;
translated: That supreme experience of the mere great bliss of the absence of appearances is the nature of the wheel of yoginis, the characteristic of the dharmakaya.

original: / gang yang kunda dang zla ba ltar dkar ba de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyams su myong ba de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal he ru ka'i ngo bor mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: / gang yang kunda dang zla ba ltar dkar ba de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems nyams su myong ba de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal he ru ka'i ngo bor mtshon par bya'o //
translated: That which is white like jasmine or the moon, the experience of the coemergent bodhicitta, should be characterized as the nature of the sambhogakaya Sri Heruka.🔽Moreover, it is said:

original: de yang / kun rdzob dung dang zla ba 'dra //
analyzed: de yang / kun rdzob dung dang zla ba 'dra //
translated: Conventionally, it is like jasmine or the moon.

original: sgrib bral bde ba'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: sgrib bral bde ba'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: Free from obscurations, it is the nature of bliss.

original: bcom ldan zhu ba'i rnam @165b par gyur //🔽de bde chags can ma rung 'dod //
analyzed: bcom ldan zhu ba'i rnam @165b par gyur // de bde chags can ma rung 'dod //
translated: The Bhagavat transforms into a state of melting.

original: ces pas so //
analyzed: ces pas so //
translated: That is asserted to be the improper desire of the passionate one.🔽Thus, it is said that this should be characterized up to the supreme and the separation from joy.

original: de lta bu ni mchog dang dga' bral gyi bar du mtshon par bya bar gsungs pa'i rigs pa shes ba'i bsam pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu ni mchog dang dga' bral gyi bar du mtshon par bya bar gsungs pa'i rigs pa shes ba'i bsam pa yin no //
translated: This is the intention of the knowledge of reasoning.

original: de yang smras pa /
analyzed: de yang smras pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: mchog dang dga' bral dbus dag tu //
analyzed: mchog dang dga' bral dbus dag tu //
translated: In the middle of the supreme and the separation from joy,

original: mtshon zhing ltos la brtan par gyis //
analyzed: mtshon zhing ltos la brtan par gyis //
translated: It is indicated, and should be stabilized by reliance.

original: zhes pa dang / dga' bral dang por mtshon bya ba //
analyzed: zhes pa dang / dga' bral dang por mtshon bya ba //
translated: And: The first indication of the separation from joy

original: de ni dga' ba gsum bral nyid //
analyzed: de ni dga' ba gsum bral nyid //
translated: Is the separation from the three joys.

original: ces gsungs / gal te bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ces gsungs / gal te bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If it is said that great bliss is not to be accomplished,

original: ma zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang / bsgrub bya nyid ma yin par dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud de nyid du bkag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ma zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang / bsgrub bya nyid ma yin par dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud de nyid du bkag pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not peaceful and because it is not to be accomplished, it is refuted in the Hevajra Tantra itself.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: de bas bde ba de nyid min //
analyzed: de bas bde ba de nyid min //
translated: Therefore, that is not the reality of bliss.

original: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
analyzed: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
translated: Because the great elements are bliss.

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa las kyang gnyis su med pa nyid bsgrub bya nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa las kyang gnyis su med pa nyid bsgrub bya nyid du gsungs pa'i phyir /
translated: And in the perfection vehicle, in the perfection of wisdom and so on, nonduality is taught to be what is to be accomplished.

original: theg pa'i khyad par la yang de kho na nyid kyi khyad par ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: theg pa'i khyad par la yang de kho na nyid kyi khyad par ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, there is no difference in reality between the vehicles,

original: de kho na nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ma yin par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that reality would not be reality.

original: ci ste thabs tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par ji lta bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ste thabs tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad par ji lta bar mi 'gyur /
translated: How could the effect be different from the means, since the effect is not different from the means?

original: rgyu'i tha dad pa las 'bras bu'i tha dad mthong phyir s'a lu'i myu gu dang nas kyi myu gu dag bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i tha dad pa las 'bras bu'i tha dad mthong phyir s'a lu'i myu gu dang nas kyi myu gu dag bzhin no //
translated: Because we see that the effect is different from the difference in the cause, as in the case of the rice sprout and the barley sprout.

original: gzhan du na skyed par byed ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
analyzed: gzhan du na skyed par byed ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro /
translated: Otherwise, there would be no production.

original: zhen de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: zhen de ni ma yin te /
translated: But that is not so.

original: snga na med pa bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: snga na med pa bskyed pa'am /
translated: The non-existent prior to production is produced.

original: 'gyur pa med pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu'i tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'gyur pa med pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu'i tha dad pa las 'bras bu tha dad pa 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: The effect that is not different from the cause is produced from the difference in the cause.

original: thob par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: thob par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not to be attained.

original: de 'thob par byed pa tsam gyis thabs la tha dad yod kyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'thob par byed pa tsam gyis thabs la tha dad yod kyi rang gi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: The means is different only in the attainment of that, not in its own nature.

original: theg pa chen po'i 'dir rtog pa ro gcig pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bu chos kyi sku'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la ni tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i 'dir rtog pa ro gcig pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa lta bu chos kyi sku'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba la ni tha dad pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In this Mahayana, the single taste of the imagination, which is the nature of the unconditioned dharmakaya like stainless space, is not different in the object to be attained.

original: de lta bas na de ni bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su mtshon par bya ba ma yin no ;
analyzed: de lta bas na de ni bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su mtshon par bya ba ma yin no ;
translated: Therefore, since it is not to be accomplished, it is not to be illustrated at the time of the consecration of the wisdom-knowledge initiation.

original: / mchog dang dga' ba dang dga' bral dag gi dbus su yang mtshon par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: / mchog dang dga' ba dang dga' bral dag gi dbus su yang mtshon par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: It is also not to be illustrated in the middle of the supreme, the joy, and the separation from joy,

original: de'i dus na bde ba'i rnam pa shin tu lhag par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i dus na bde ba'i rnam pa shin tu lhag par gyur pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because at that time the aspect of bliss is extremely predominant.

original: shin tu mya ngan las 'das par rab tu gsal zhing /🔽ro gcig pa bya ba byas pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: shin tu mya ngan las 'das par rab tu gsal zhing / ro gcig pa bya ba byas pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can /
translated: It is extremely clear as nirvana,
and it has the characteristic of having done what was to be done, which is of one taste.

original: dus na nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus na nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: At that time, it is not experienced.

original: de lta bas na dga' ba cig can sangs rgyas kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba shin tu rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba chen po lta zhog byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa nyid la yang shin tu bde ba chen po nyid du bstan te ;
analyzed: de lta bas na dga' ba cig can sangs rgyas kyi sgrib pa dang bral ba shin tu rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba chen po lta zhog byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa nyid la yang shin tu bde ba chen po nyid du bstan te ;
translated: Therefore, let alone the bliss of the buddhas, who are free from the single joy of the obstructions, it is taught that there is great bliss on the eighth bodhisattva ground itself.🔽And that is stated:

original: de yang / de las rab zhi mi g-yo mchog //
analyzed: de yang / de las rab zhi mi g-yo mchog //
translated: From that, the supreme, unshakable, and peaceful

original: dbang gyur mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: dbang gyur mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid //
translated: The mastery of the non-dual, the state of equality,

original: rnam par mi rtog bde ba ni //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog bde ba ni //
translated: The non-conceptual bliss,

original: byang chub sems dpa' thob par 'gyur //🔽zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thob par 'gyur // zhes gsungs pas so //
translated: The Bodhisattva attains.

original: gang yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid las kyang /
analyzed: gang yang dgyes pa'i rdo rje nyid las kyang /
translated: And also in the Hevajra Tantra itself:

original: bde ba bsgrub bya nyid du bkag pa de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: bde ba bsgrub bya nyid du bkag pa de yang mi rigs te /
translated: The refutation of the attainment of bliss is not correct.

original: der ni zag pa med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i bde ba bsgrub bya ma yin par bkag pa med do //
analyzed: der ni zag pa med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i bde ba bsgrub bya ma yin par bkag pa med do //
translated: There is no refutation of the attainment of the immaculate bliss which is like space.

original: 'on kyang dper bstan pa'i bde ba zag pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: 'on kyang dper bstan pa'i bde ba zag pa dang bcas pa /
translated: However, some may think that the bliss which is illustrated by the example,

original: nyams pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: nyams pa dang bcas pa /
translated: which is contaminated,🔽and which is subject to decay, is to be attained.

original: bsgrub bya nyid du sems par 'ga' zhig 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nyid du sems par 'ga' zhig 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bkag pa yin no //
translated: With this in mind, it is refuted.🔽And also,

original: gang yang / dga' bral mthar ni gnas pa la //🔽zhes bya ba'i tshig gis de nyid du bya ba byas pa /
analyzed: gang yang / dga' bral mthar ni gnas pa la // zhes bya ba'i tshig gis de nyid du bya ba byas pa /
translated: In the end, one abides in the separation from joy.🔽By this statement, the characteristic of the supreme nirvana is illustrated,

original: mchog tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can mtshon par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: mchog tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can mtshon par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: and the act is done there.

original: bde ba chen po ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba chen po ni ma yin no zhes gang smras pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That which you have said, “It is not great bliss,” is also unreasonable.

original: dga' bral mthar ni zhes bya ba der yang 'bru mang po'i bsdu pa yin no //🔽gang yang / lhan cig skyes dga'i 'jug nyid do //
analyzed: dga' bral mthar ni zhes bya ba der yang 'bru mang po'i bsdu pa yin no // gang yang / lhan cig skyes dga'i 'jug nyid do //
translated: In the phrase “at the end of the separation from joy,” there is a compounding of many words.

original: zhes bstan pa der yang 'jug nyid ni lhag ma gsum po nyid de rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa der yang 'jug nyid ni lhag ma gsum po nyid de rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And in the statement, “The entry into connate joy,” there is an entry into the three remaining joys, but that is unreasonable.

original: de nyid ni bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, you should understand that it is to be cultivated.🔽Moreover, if you assert that at the end of the separation from joy, the single taste of complete pacification,

original: gzhan yang dga' bral gyi mthar rab tu zhi ba ro gcig pa gnyis su med pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang dga' bral gyi mthar rab tu zhi ba ro gcig pa gnyis su med pa /
translated: nonduality,

original: brjod pa med pa /
analyzed: brjod pa med pa /
translated: the inexpressible,

original: 'dod pa med pa /
analyzed: 'dod pa med pa /
translated: the absence of desire,

original: 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes 'dod na yang /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes 'dod na yang /
translated: and the absence of both attachment and nonattachment is to be accomplished,

original: de lta bu ni mi srid de /
analyzed: de lta bu ni mi srid de /
translated: that is impossible.

original: gang gi phyir de'i gnas skabs na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyams su myong ba med pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i gnas skabs na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nyams su myong ba med pa ste /
translated: Because at that time, nondual wisdom is not experienced.

original: thabs dang shes rab dag gi yul rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab dag gi yul rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the objects of method and wisdom appear in various ways.

analyzed: brjod pa med pa yang ma yin te nyams su myong ba'i don du ma la rab tu rtog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not inexpressible, because it is thoroughly imagined to be the meaning of experience.

original: 'dod @166b chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba spangs pa yang ma yin te lus zungs zad par gyur ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba srid la /
analyzed: 'dod @166b chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba spangs pa yang ma yin te lus zungs zad par gyur ba la 'dod chags dang bral ba srid la /
translated: It is not the abandonment of desire and freedom from desire, because it is possible that freedom from desire occurs when the body's elements are exhausted,

original: lus zungs 'phel bar gyur pa la yang 'dod chags skye bar gyur pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus zungs 'phel bar gyur pa la yang 'dod chags skye bar gyur pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and it is possible that desire arises when the body's elements increase.

original: de 'dod chags bral ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de 'dod chags bral ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not freedom from desire,

original: yang 'jug par mos pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang 'jug par mos pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible to aspire to engage in desire again.

original: mig la sogs pa btsums pa'i 'bad pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa spong par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa btsums pa'i 'bad pa nyid kyis rnam par rtog pa spong par 'gyur zhing /
translated: By the mere effort of closing the eyes, conceptual thoughts are abandoned,

original: bye brag tu snang ba nub par gyur na phyag rgya'i dgos pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bye brag tu snang ba nub par gyur na phyag rgya'i dgos pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur te /
translated: and when the appearance of distinctions subsides, the purpose of the seal is fruitless,

original: gzhan du yang de grub pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: gzhan du yang de grub pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because it is established elsewhere.

original: shes rab kyi chu skyes dang sbyor ba med na mchog tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bya ba byas pa nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi chu skyes dang sbyor ba med na mchog tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bya ba byas pa nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If one does not unite with the lotus of wisdom, one will not accomplish the act of supreme nirvana.

original: zas dang / bsku mnye dang / khrus la sogs pas kyang de lta bu'i bya ba byas pas skyed par 'gyur te mang du smra cig dgos /
analyzed: zas dang / bsku mnye dang / khrus la sogs pas kyang de lta bu'i bya ba byas pas skyed par 'gyur te mang du smra cig dgos /
translated: But that is not so, because such an act is generated by food, massage, bathing, and so on.

original: smras pa / rnal 'byor ma rgyud bsgrub bya 'di //
analyzed: smras pa / rnal 'byor ma rgyud bsgrub bya 'di //
translated: The yoga tantra to be accomplished is

original: lhan cig skyes grags bde ba che //🔽mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral gyi //🔽dang por 'bad pas mtshon par bya //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes grags bde ba che // mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral gyi // dang por 'bad pas mtshon par bya //
translated: the great bliss renowned as connate,

original: zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: first indicated by effort at the limit of the supreme and the separation of joy.

translated: If one asks, how many types of initiation are asserted in the yoga tantras such as Sri Guhyasamaja and in the yogini tantras such as Sri Heruka?

analyzed: de la kha cig ni dpal gsang ba 'dus par ni dbang bskur ba rnam pa gsum du 'dod de /
translated: Some assert that in Sri Guhyasamaja there are three types of initiation.

original: dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa gsum //
translated: Initiation is threefold.

original: rgyud 'di ru ni bstan pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba'i tshig dang lus dang ngag dang yid dag par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rgyud 'di ru ni bstan pa yin // zhes bya ba'i tshig dang lus dang ngag dang yid dag par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is taught in this tantra.🔽The words, body, speech, and mind are purified.
